attributes.action: Fair Pay. Safe Staffing. Safer Care for Everyone
attributes.additional_details: Nurses save lives every day but face unsafe staffing, low pay, burnout, and unsafe workplaces. We demand fair wages, safe nurse-to-patient ratios, mental health support, reduced administrative burden, career growth, and a voice in policy. Supporting nurses ensures safer care, healthier patients, and a stronger, sustainable healthcare system.
attributes.background: Fair compensation and safe staffing are not optional — they are essential to sustaining quality patient care and a resilient healthcare system. Nurses can’t provide quality care if they’re overworked and underpaid. It’s time to value those who care for us all.

rejection.details:
We are not entirely clear what you are asking the UK Government or Parliament to do. You can submit a new petition setting this out more clearly.

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740313
